thread.title: Here's What The Cast Of "The Nanny" Looks Like Today
thread.title_full: Here's What The Cast Of "The Nanny" Looks Like Today

author: Bibiñe Barud
title: Here's What The Cast Of "The Nanny" Looks Like Today

organizations.name: cbs imeh akpanudosen / stringer  renée taylor

text:
CBS Monica Schipper / Stringer
 It’s hard to believe, but when Fran Drescher became Fran Fine back in 1993, she was already 35 years old. At the age of 59, Fran still manages to look younger than her years. She’s still working, and recently did some voice acting for a Disney show called The 7D .
She’s also an outspoken uterine cancer survivor and founder of the Cancer Schmancer Movement .
ID: 10345000 2. Charles Shaughnessy as Maxwell Sheffield. CBS
charlesshaughnessy/Instagram
 When he wasn’t out campaigning on behalf of Hillary Clinton, Charles Shaughnessy was starring in the soap opera Days of Our Lives until last year. This year he’s set to star in a science fiction movie called Moontrap Target Earth .
ID: 10345001 3. Daniel Davis as Niles. CBS
Astrid Stawiarz / Stringer
 The man behind everyone’s favorite butler still finds time to act sporadically. Last year he filmed a short called The Fold and before that he appeared as Jacob Skolimski on the show Gotham .
ID: 10345002 4. Lauren Lane as C.C. Babcock. CBS
mslaurenlane1/TWITTER
 The actress left acting in movies and TV in 2001, but she has continued her career in Austin, Texas, where she is a theater teacher and actress.
ID: 10345003 5. Nicholle Tom as Maggie Sheffield. CBS
Michael Buckner / Staff
 Nicholle was 15 when she started the series. Since then she’s continued acting and has had minor roles on shows like Gotham , Criminal Minds and Masters of Sex . She has a puppy named Chesty Chew that she always shows off on her Instagram .
ID: 10345004 6. Benjamin Salisbury as Brighton Sheffield. CBS
NoH8Campaign
 Benjamin was 13 when he started on The Nanny . He went on to study journalism and it has been more than a decade since he last acted in anything.
ID: 10345005 7. Madeline Zima as Grace Sheffield. Frederick M. Brown / Stringer
Jesse Grant / Stringer
 The youngest and cutest of the Sheffield siblings was just eight years old when the show started. Since then she has continued acting consistently. She’s appeared in Californication , The Vampire Diaries , and very soon you’ll see her in the much anticipated Twin Peaks .
ID: 10345006 8. Renée Taylor as Sylvia Fine. CBS
Imeh Akpanudosen / Stringer
 Renée Taylor hasn’t stopped acting since she started her career in 1958. She has two movies coming out this year: Tango Shalom and How To Be a Latin Lover . She’s also the voice of Gloria in Bob’s Burgers and appeared on How I Met Your Mother several times.
ID: 10345007 9. Rachel Chagall as Val Toriello. CBS
OfficialFranDrescher
 Fran’s best friend left acting in 2006. She’s the mother of two children and her last acting credit was on the sitcom What I Like About You . There aren’t many recent photos of her; this one from 2004 is one of the most recent.
ID: 10345008 10. Ann Morgan Guilbert as Yetta Rosenberg. CBS
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Staff
 Sadly, the actress behind the beloved grandmother Yetta passed away on June 14th, 2016. She was still acting right up until her final days.
ID: 10345009 This post was translated from Spanish .
ID: 10345030
